overview: Twenty-Five Scenes of Vintage 1970's Action from the Falcon Vault. Here are some of the gems that helped build the Falcon empire in its early years. Featuring Legends of Male Erotica like Roger, Dick Fisk, Casey Donovan, Scott O'Hara, Sky Dawson, Kris Bjorn, and Mac Turner ... plus many, many more!
tagline: 50 Men sucking and fucking like there's no tomorrow.
title: Best of the 1970's: Volume 1
